-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--                                Movie Info                                 --
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
He has survived on the streets for twenty years. He is a gambler... a thief...
a junkie... a killer and a cop. Now he's investigating the most shocking case
of his life, and as he moves closer to the truth his self-destructive past is
closing in.

Harvey Keitel gives a searing performance as an out-of-control police
detective on a collision course with disaster in director Abel Ferrara's
brilliant and deeply disturbing melodrama.
